derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French, from Italian balletto, diminutive of ballo 'a dance', from late Latin ballare 'to dance' (see ball)

entry.def: Ballet is a type of very skilled and artistic dancing with carefully planned movements.

example.ex: I trained as a ballet dancer...

entry.def: A ballet is an artistic work that is performed by ballet dancers.

example.ex: The performance will include the premiere of three new ballets.
